mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_entity_window_manage
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from t_entity_window_manage where IS_DELETE = 0 and USER_OIDS like concat('%', #{userOid}, '%')

select
from t_entity_window_manage where IS_DELETE = 0 and USER_OIDS is not null
